body.p:
There are 26 sports available within the Intramural Sports department. Sports range from darts, dodgeball, and golf to intertube water polo. Below is a list of all the available sports. For more information regarding each individual sport, please visit <link> </link>
To begin the selection process, review the sports and registration/league play dates.
Once you have reviewed the sports and dates listed below, choose the one that best interests you and accomodates your schedule.
8-ball
Singles
Registration: August 22-September 2
League Play: September 9-November 11

League Play: February 5-April 7
